评论详情: Its on the thin side but I like it

Poor quality! Received the jacket with a missing button and the manufacturer didn’t care so I returned the product. I contacted the manufacturer first to give them an opportunity to make it right, after requesting order info and pictures of the issue they asked me to return it through Amazon instead of fixing the problem themselves so they just wasted my time.

I accidentally ordered a medium when my husband wears XL so we gave it to our 20 yr old and actually he loved it. He’s very tall so it was on the shorter side for him but it’s styled to be a little shorter like a bomber jacket. Nice chocolate brown color and a medium/light weight perfect for fall.
The material, style, and quality met my expectations. The color and fit also was surprisingly just as advertised. I purchased more than one.

Love everything about this!! It's soft, comfortable, light weight and as advertised. Have ordered this brand several times and so far, have not been disappointed. Fits well and looks amazing on hubby. It wears more and feels like a nice sweater more than a 'jacket'.

This jacket is lightweight and very simple. It is not for those wanting a bold fashion statement, but it is great for those wanting to put together a simple, clean look.  The size chart is accurate, and the jacket is well made.

评论概述: This is a Really Sharp Looking Jacket
评论详情: A cool and flexible jacket designed to keep you comfy and looking sharp, no matter what you're up to.  Made from top-notchmaterial, this jacket is light but tough, perfect for everyday use. The black color gives it a classy vibe, and the snap button closure makes it look classic and never out of style.  A big highlight of this jacket is the baseball letterman design. It brings a sporty and chill vibe to the mix, making it great for hanging out with buddies or a casual date night. The letterman design also brings back some good old-school vibes, perfect for fans of retro fashion.  The COOFANDY Men's Casual Lightweight Jacket comes in an X-Large, so it fits a lot of different body types. The loose fit is comfy but still keeps you looking sleek.  This jacket is not just about looks; it's also got you covered. The light material makes it easy to layer when it gets chilly, and the snap button closure makes getting it on and off a breeze. The two side pockets are big enough to hold all your essentials, making it a go-to for everyday wear.  Whether you're going out for a casual event or just running some errands, this jacket is a solid choice. Its mix of style and versatility means it's a great piece to hang in any guy's closet. Throw it on with jeans and a t-shirt for a chill vibe, or dress it up with chinos and a button-down shirt for a more put-together look.  The COOFANDY Men's Casual Lightweight Jacket is a stylish and practical pick for any guy. Its blend of comfort, durability, and trendy design make it a standout piece that will take your outfits to the next level. So, don't wait any longer – grab this jacket and see how it transforms your style. It has done exactly that for me and I'm 47 years old!

This jacket has a bit of weight but not heavy feeling. Material is silk like, a bit stretchy, but I've had material like this before that quickly pills. Quite comfortable with enough bagginess to add a hoodie. 5'7, 170lbs and medium fits slightly loose.
Great jacket which is comfortable and looks good. True to size in my experience, and feels of decent quality.

评论概述: Not really a jacket but stylish
评论详情: I got this for my son who was looking for this type of jacket and the price point was great, but it is not necessarily a jacket as the material is very thin. It would be nice for those days in the spring where it starts off cold and then gets warmer during the day, the quality seems to be lackluster but only time will tell. In the meantime my son really likes it so that makes me happy.

This is a fairly lightweight jacket with a snap button front. That's the only similarity to a letterman's jacket that you might remember from high school. That said, it's comfortable and the sizing was accurate. Recommended.

Made of a silky, satiny fabric that has a nice weight to it.  Looks good and is very comfortable.  The neck hangs a little lower than a standard baseball jacket, which you can easily see in the pictures.  They represent the way it looks pretty accurately; definitely a looser fit.It's great for the price.
The cloth is not of fine quality. the sleeve in the hand was also not going through.

The coofandy baseball jacket is not what I expected. The material is more like a jogging suit material. For me personally it’s not the material for me. I’m 5’6” at 175lbs and it’s a little big on me. Other than that the snap buttons work well. The color is nice. I’m a little surprised about this jacket because I have other coofandy clothing and all fit me better than this jacket.

This COOFANDY letterman jacket is perfect for casual outings. The lightweight material makes it comfortable for various weather conditions, and the brown color is versatile and stylish. The snap button closure adds a classic touch. Ideal for those looking for a fashionable and functional jacket. Highly recommend for its style and versatility.

I really like whatever the material this is made from, the liner is super soft and light enough for a cool weather jacket while still providing warmth.  I'm usually not a light jacket person but I will definitely be using this one as the days get cooler.

A bit loose for me. I got it in small and the sizing is definitely US size. It honestly feels more like a cardigan since it just drapes on me. I’m 5’7” 155 lbs and this jacket leaves plenty of room. Fabric is very soft and stretchy. Very cool to the touch. I wish the waist is tighter

评论概述: Well-designed jacket with front snap closure – runs small
评论详情: My husband needed a casual jacket to wear on cooler days. After checking the measurements in the sizing chart, I ordered a Large, his normal size (he’s 6’2” and 180 lbs). The polyester/spandex material is silky soft and medium gauge. The jacket is lined, which gives it an insulating factor.  The collar, cuffs, and hem are a stretchy rib-knit fabric/design. There are six gunmetal grey snaps down the front and two hand pockets.  The jacket is well-made and has a sporty design. But it runs small and is tight at the shoulders, falls short in the back, and the sleeves aren’t long enough, at least for my husband.  It’s a nice lighter-weight coat, but you may want to size up to get a good fit.

This bomber baseball Jacket is silky smooth and medium weight . The fabric feels weighted, it’s smooth and silky but it hangs because of the weight . It’s not a silk blend that you think would blow around like curtains. It snaps shut. I got an xxl and it fits as a true size as expected. I just need to take a steamer to it . Very Happy Enjoy
Get fit light weight. Good color and no issues

评论概述: Fits great, feels great, look great
评论详情: I got the XL size. I’m 6’1” and 220 lbs with the dadbod version of an athletic build. This fits me like a glove. Not too tight and not too loose anywhere. I didn’t expect it to be as comfortable as it is. And it is comfortable.  As much as I like it, my wife tried it on just fooling around and it actually looks really good on her as an oversized and trendy boyfriend-style jacket.  The materials are good quality and it was well crafted.  Easy five stars.

The COOFANDY Men's Casual Lightweight Jacket will be perfect for the upcoming Fall season, as it doesn't get incredibly cold but it does get a little cold where I live.  The jacket is a polyester (92%) and spandex (8%) blend and is comfortable to wear and has a little weight to it.  I really like the snap buttons and the elastic cuff fit nicely around my wrists.  The jacket runs true to size.  Great for a Fall night and would recommend.

评论概述: Another good one from Coofandy, great Varsity Jacket
评论详情: Surprisingly heavy for a thin Varsity Jacket! I love it. It feels very premium, and it looks sharp. I have several items from Coofandy now and they are all just so good and an incredible value. This guy is 92% Polyester and 8% Spandex. Not going to want to tumble dry. Very pleased, a keeper!

评论概述: Nice Quality & Design Though Small To Size
评论详情: I ordered a size large, I am usually a size medium. I find this quite small and a medium absolutely would not fit me. I intend on losing a little weight so hopefully it will fit better. That being said I can still wear it and it does button up for me.  The design is very minimalist and modern, but I wouldn't say it's a varsity jacket or lettermen. Maybe a fashionable version of a baseball jacket. The fabric is lightweight but it's also lined. I would say this is a little like a 'shacket'. I would wear this over a t-shirt but with a heavier jacket or coat over it during a colder day or night.  I have paired this with different wardrobe staples and I find that it looks best with a nicely fitting white t-shirt, black or dark grey jeans and a pair of black loafers or chelsea boots.  As others have pointed out, there is no zip, just stud fastenings which can be a little annoying if you are in a hurry and want to close up. Aside from that I really like this jacket and will definitely wear it more.
This casual vanity jacket is soft to the touch, of good quality, comfortable, and fits as expected. I highly recommend it.

This jacket was not what I was expecting when the description stated baseball bomber jacket.  I turned out that it was just a light weight button up jacket that runs a little on the small side.  I had originally ordered this for my husband but ended giving it to my son instead.

评论概述: great summer to fall transition jacket
评论详情: got this for my boyfriend, and it's perfect for those end of summer nights that start transitioning into fall weather. nice, lightweight material and can be dressed slightly up if needed

评论概述: Unusual take on the classic varsity/letterman's jacket
评论详情: The COOFANDY Mens Casual Varsity Jacket is a different take on the classic varsity/letterman’s jacket. This casual lightweight jacket is suitable for a cool September afternoon, and you could add additional layers for colder weather. I plan to use it as a warm-up jacket when playing tennis outdoors this fall.  In the olden days, letterman’s jackets were made of wool with leather arms. This 2020s version is 92% polyester and 8% spandex, and the spandex gives it lots of stretch. In the text on the Amazon website, the Chinese manufacturer refers to the jacket as a “bomber jacket windbreaker.” I have my doubts about this windbreaking claim but haven’t had a chance to test the jacket outdoors, since it’s still summer.  Like most letterman’s jackets, this garment has a snap front (6 snaps). It has a ribbed collar, cuffs and hem.  Many -- perhaps most -- jackets today have a separate pocket for a cell phone. This varsity jacket has two deep slash pockets for your hands but no other pockets.  Though the text on the Amazon site says “hand washes,” the tag on the jacket says it’s OK to machine wash but “do not tumble dry.”  As far as size goes, I’m 5’10” and 160, and the Large fit me perfectly.  ###

So the title of the product is slightly misleading. While it does have the look of a bomber/letterman jacket, the material is definitely not what you would expect of one. With that being said, it does lay well and fits true to size. The material is more typical of other Coofandy products, where it is more of a soft supple texture.

This is a nice warm jacket.  Looks good.  The large size fit my 5'7". 190# frame.  It has snap buttons instead of zipper.  It is soft, comfortable and warm.  Not sure it meets the descriptive of baseball, letterman, bomber, but I do like it and look forward to using it when the weather cools.  Reasonable price.

评论概述: Definitely not a bomber jacket but...
评论详情: Hey Everyone, Dori here. I ordered dark grey in xxl for my husband and he really likes this jacket but it's definitely not a bomber jacket. It's really nice and soft material. It snaps up rather than zips up. Fits him great so it is true to size. But the sleeves could be a little bit longer. When you stretch out your arms the sleeves are very short. The product description is not at all what I received. For it to match the description it's gotta be made out of the correct kinds of materials and colors and it has to have a zipper. This jacket is good for spring and fall. But it is nice and nice looking on also. It's worth the money it's just definitely not a bomber jacket but I do recommend if you want a nice, comfy, soft jacket.
